rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Art Deco elements including geometric patterns and metallic finishes. Includes seating arrangements and a focal statement piece.
Integrated open kitchen adjacent to the living area with built-in cabinetry in Art Deco style, incorporating glass-fronted display units.
Functional bathroom space with Art Deco fixtures and streamlined design.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed according to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow, placed on the east side of the plot.
A small balcony overlooking the garden area, providing natural light and air circulation.
